overview: Michael Bergstrom, CPA, Chief Financial Officer, graduated from the University of North Texas in 1993 with Bachelors and Masters degrees in accounting. He joined SecureNet in March of 1998. Prior to that, he spent three years in public accounting before moving into private industry, working for the largest food service company in the world. The diverse clientele he serviced while in public accounting, as well as his experience with a Fortune 500 company, has given him a broad and diversified understanding of accounting policies and procedures. Michael manages SecureNet’s financial affairs ensuring that the company maintains an excellent credit record and a strong financial structure to facilitate rapid growth. He uses his experience to manage the company’s accounting function and to ensure that both external and internal customers receive exceptional service.
